body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Given there are 2018 1s, as shown below: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\underbrace{\\text{1  1  1  1  ......  1  1}}_\\text{{2018 1s}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" that you are allowed to add pluses between the 1s. What is the maximum number of pluses can be added so that the expression above equals to 8102?"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"As a starting approach one can try to maximise the number of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s in our expression: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111 \times a + 111 \times b + 11 \times c + 1 \times d = 8102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"It is most efficient to use the most "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s as possible. Hence we want to maximise "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" s.t. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8102 - 1111 \times a \geq 2018 - 4a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This gives "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8102 - 5555 = 2547"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We can continue by maximising "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" s.t. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2547 - 111 \times b \geq 2018 - 20 - 3b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This gives "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b = 5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8102 - 5555 - 555 = 1992"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We now look for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" s.t. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1992 - 11 \times c = 2018 - 20 - 15 - 2c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfies this."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Currently we have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111 \times 5 + 111 \times 5 + 11 \times 1 + 1 \times 1981 = 8102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". With "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1991 ( = a + b + c + d - 1) "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" pluses. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d > 1981"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" < 2018 - 1981 - 16 = 21"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" 1's left. So "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" b < 7"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and we can't reach "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".
Similarly if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 5, b = 4, d > 1981"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" < 2018 - 1981 - 12 - 20 = 5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c < 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and we can't reach "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"One should note that there is a similar solutions for years "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2013"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Assuming we are summing the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s to equal the year reversed. All have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1991"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" pluses."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"E.g. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111 \times 6 + 111 \times 4 + 11 \times 1 + 1 \times 1981 = 9102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as we swapped "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which gains "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1000"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and uses one more "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".
Likewise if we swap "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we can do earlier years:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111 \times 0 + 111 \times 10 + 11 \times 1 + 1 \times 1981 = 3102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is possible. We can't have any "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2102 = 11c + (2012 - 2c)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2012 + 9c = 2102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c = 10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2102 = 11 \times 10 + 1 \times 1992"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2001"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" pluses."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is a matter of solving the linear programming problem to maximize "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b+c+d-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for nonnegative integers subject to the constraints
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 1111a + 111b + 11c + d \; = \; 8102 \hspace{2cm} 4a + 3b + 2c +d \; = \; 2018 "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
the maximum value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{1991}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is achieved with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a=5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b=5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d=1981"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            I've realized you're not wrong and I'm not wrong.  We're just counting the number of "+" symbols diferently.  My objection is incorrect because I didn't account for the change to d.  But with the constraints we have, maximizing a + b + c + d is equivalent to minimizing 3a +  2b + c.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

We are creating "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b+c+d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" numbers, namely "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" copies of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" copies of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" copies of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" copies of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".

"}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"They have to add to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111a + 111b + 11c + d = 8102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We have to use exactly "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2108"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" copies of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and hence "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4a + 3b + 2c + d = 2108"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"These numbers have to be joined together with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b+c+d-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" pluses, so that is the quantity we need to maximize."}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Why maximize a + b + c + d?  That's not  the right target function.
The solution you have gives a + b + c + d - 1 = 1991.  If I change b to 4 and c to 13 I get a + b + c + d - 1 = 2000.  But I have many fewer '+' symbols."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What you want to do is "},{"type":"text","text":"miinimize","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]},{"type":"text","text":" 3"},{"type":"text","text":"a + 2","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]},{"type":"text","text":"b + c.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Formulation:
Find values of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(a,b,c,d)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" such that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a*1111 + b*111 + c*111 + d = 8102"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4*a + 3*b + 2*c + d = 2018"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(3*a + 2*b + c)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is minimized."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let us approach the problem from this perspective:
If we start with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d = 2018"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2017"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" symbols but the sum is only "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2108"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
If we change a ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 + 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" to an "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have one fewer ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" symbol, but the sum increases by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".
If we change ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+1+1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have two fewer ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" symbols, and the sum increases by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"99"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
If we change ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+1+1+1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have three fewer ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" symbols, and the sum increases by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"999"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So how many ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" symbols do we remove going from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d=2018"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the correct solution?  Well, for each ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" we remove "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" symbols, and for each ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" we remove "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" symbols, while for each ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" we remove "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" symbol.  Thus the target function is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3a + 2b + c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Our heuristic is to maximize "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then maximize "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then maximize "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  Each ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+1+1+1 \rightarrow 1111 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" transition increases the sum by an average of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"333 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" per ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" removed, while each ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+1+1 \rightarrow 111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" transition increases the sum by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"49.5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" per ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" removed, and each ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+1 \rightarrow 11 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" transition only increases the sum by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" per ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" removed."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now note that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a < 6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", because "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6666 + 1994 = 8660"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which is too much. "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
If we let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 5,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b < 6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" by a similar calculation."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Finally, observe that if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = 5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b = 5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then if we let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d = 1981"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have a solution.  These values of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" require removing only "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"26"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" signs.  And no other sum that removes only "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"26"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ""},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"" signs will achieve the same sum."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 111 Followers!

We re-write the series as  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{1}, a_{1} + x , a_{1} + 2x, a_{1} + 3x, .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  , a_{1} + 110x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now adding them, we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111a_{1} + 6105x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dividing them by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" , we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{1} + 55x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which is their arithmetic mean."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"'a_{i}'"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" th term is given by  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{i}  = a_{1} + (i-1)x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"                                                                  "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence by comparing  , we get our answer as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{56}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
